about_the_game:
Warning: This DLC contains sexually explicit content! It is only suitable for adults aged 18 or above, and contains content that some players may find offensive (note: this DLC contains nudity, sex, violence, rape, coercion, sexual abuse, crime and other pornographic and violent content) [ /h2]
After adding this DLC, all the pictures in the album will be changed to adult videos
Adult content scenes with female characters. Note: This DLC contains nudity, sex, violence, rape, coercion, sexual abuse, crime and other pornographic and violent content. Please consider before purchasing!
The subject matter, content, and form of this work are all fictitious creations. Any similarity is purely coincidental. The fictional pornographic content in the content is for leisure and entertainment purposes only. Please do not imitate!
All characters in the game are over 18 years old. You must be over 18 years old to enter the game

This is a prequel to a story

Doyeon once had a very smooth life, with outstanding appearance, a financially superior family, and an excellent job. She just got married today to her boyfriend who has been in love for many years, and tonight is their wedding night's carnival party~ Of course she won't miss it, dressing up and going with her husband.
But no one expected that the two policemen would be retaliated by their enemies... Unfortunately, it was difficult for her to fight with two fists. She was held down in the back alley of the bar by multiple men and suffered humiliation and sexual abuse. The specific incident happened to her. And I can’t remember clearly, I just remember that my whole body hurt.
After disappearing for many days, she was found naked at the door of the police station...and her poor husband's body has not been found yet.

content_descriptors.notes:
This work may contain nudity, sex, violence, rape, coercion, sexual abuse, crime and other pornographic and violent content, please consider before purchasing
The characters, place names, events, plots, etc. appearing in this work are all fictitious, and all themes, contents, and forms are fictitious creations.
Any similarities are purely coincidental, and the fictional fantasy content contained in the content is for entertainment purposes only.
All characters in this game are 18 years or older.

name: A fascinating story : Wedding Night - adult patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: This is a very simple card flip game where you turn over a card and then try to find another matching card. You only need to click on the card to find the same card as the image that appears, and the identical ones will be eliminated.
